plot: Detective novelist Liu Yunfei takes it upon himself to investigate a series of murders on a cruise ship. This is the sequel to the 2010 film "Lost in Panic Room."
title: Mi shi zi bu ke kao an
plot_es: Detective novelist Liu Yunfei takes it upon himself to investigate a series of murders on a cruise ship. This is the sequel to the 2010 film "Lost in Panic Room."
original_name: Mi shi zi bu ke kao an
